sections.title: 1. General Provisions
content: This personal data processing policy is drawn up in accordance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated May 21, 2013 No. 94-V "On Personal Data and Their Protection" and defines the procedure for processing personal data and measures to ensure the security of personal data of RabotaVsem company (hereinafter - the Operator).

The Operator sets as its most important goal and condition for the implementation of its activities the observance of human and civil rights and freedoms in the processing of personal data, including the protection of the rights to privacy, personal and family secrets.
This Operator's policy regarding the processing of personal data (hereinafter - the Policy) applies to all information that the Operator can receive about visitors to the RabotaVsem platform website.

sections.title: 2. Basic Concepts Used in the Policy
content: Automated processing of personal data - processing of personal data using computer technology;
Blocking of personal data - temporary termination of processing of personal data (except for cases where processing is necessary to clarify personal data);
Website - a set of graphic and information materials, as well as computer programs and databases that ensure their availability on the Internet at the address of the RabotaVsem platform;
Information system of personal data - a set of personal data contained in databases and information technologies and technical means that ensure their processing;

Depersonalization of personal data - actions as a result of which it is impossible to determine without using additional information the ownership of personal data to a specific User or other subject of personal data;

Processing of personal data - any action (operation) or set of actions (operations) performed with or without the use of automation tools with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (update, change), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of personal data;

Operator - a state body, municipal body, legal entity or individual, independently or jointly with other persons organizing and (or) carrying out the processing of personal data, as well as determining the purposes of processing personal data, the composition of personal data to be processed, actions (operations) performed with personal data;
Personal data - any information relating directly or indirectly to a specific or identifiable User of the website;
User - any visitor to the RabotaVsem platform website;
Provision of personal data - actions aimed at disclosing personal data to a specific person or a specific circle of persons;

Distribution of personal data - any actions aimed at disclosing personal data to an indefinite circle of persons (transfer of personal data) or at familiarizing with personal data of an unlimited circle of persons, including the publication of personal data in the media, placement in information and telecommunication networks or providing access to personal data in any other way;
Cross-border transfer of personal data - transfer of personal data to the territory of a foreign state to a foreign state authority, foreign individual or foreign legal entity;

Destruction of personal data - any actions as a result of which personal data are destroyed irrevocably with the impossibility of further restoration of the content of personal data in the information system of personal data and (or) as a result of which material carriers of personal data are destroyed.

sections.title: 3. The Operator May Process the Following Personal Data of the User
content: Last name, first name, patronymic;
Email address;
Phone numbers;
Specialist profile information (service descriptions, work experience, skills, education);
Data for official employment (passport data, IIN, documents confirming qualifications);
Address of residence or work;
The site also collects and processes anonymized data about visitors (including "cookie" files) using Internet statistics services (Yandex Metrica, Google Analytics and others);
Technical data (IP address, browser type, operating system, device information);
The above data are further combined by the general concept of Personal Data in the text of the Policy.

sections.title: 4. Purposes of Personal Data Processing
content: The purpose of processing the User's personal data is to ensure the functioning of the RabotaVsem platform, including:
Creating and managing specialist profiles;
Organizing communication between clients and specialists;
Ensuring official employment of specialists;
Informing the User by sending emails and SMS messages;
Conducting verification and verification of user data;

The Operator also has the right to send notifications to the User about new platform features, special offers and various events. The User can always refuse to receive informational messages by sending a letter to the Operator's email address with the note "Refusal of notifications about new products and services and special offers";
Anonymized User data collected using Internet statistics services serve to collect information about User actions on the site, improve the quality of the site and its content.

sections.title: 5. Legal Basis for Personal Data Processing
content: The Operator processes the User's personal data only if they are filled in and/or sent by the User independently through special forms located on the RabotaVsem platform. By filling out the relevant forms and/or sending their personal data to the Operator, the User expresses their consent to this Policy;
The Operator processes anonymized data about the User if this is allowed in the User's browser settings (saving "cookie" files and using JavaScript technology is enabled).

sections.title: 6. Procedure for Collection, Storage, Transfer and Other Types of Personal Data Processing
content: The security of personal data processed by the Operator is ensured through the implementation of legal, organizational and technical measures necessary to fully comply with the requirements of current legislation in the field of personal data protection.
The Operator ensures the safety of personal data and takes all possible measures to exclude access to personal data by unauthorized persons.

The User's personal data will never, under any circumstances, be transferred to third parties, except in cases related to the execution of current legislation, as well as in cases where this is necessary to ensure official employment of specialists (transfer of data to employers, government agencies within the framework of labor relations).

In case of detection of inaccuracies in personal data, the User can update them independently through the personal account on the platform or by sending a notification to the Operator's email address with the note "Updating personal data".

The period of processing personal data is unlimited. The User can withdraw their consent to the processing of personal data at any time by sending a notification to the Operator via email with the note "Withdrawal of consent to the processing of personal data".

sections.title: 7. Cross-Border Transfer of Personal Data
content: Before starting the cross-border transfer of personal data, the Operator is obliged to make sure that the foreign state, to whose territory it is supposed to transfer personal data, provides reliable protection of the rights of personal data subjects.

Cross-border transfer of personal data to the territories of foreign states that do not meet the above requirements can only be carried out if there is written consent of the personal data subject to the cross-border transfer of his personal data and/or execution of a contract, the party of which is the personal data subject.

sections.title: 8. Final Provisions
content: The User can get any clarifications on issues of interest regarding the processing of his personal data by contacting the Operator through the feedback form on the platform or by email.
This document will reflect any changes to the Operator's personal data processing policy. The Policy is valid indefinitely until it is replaced by a new version.
The current version of the Policy is freely available on the Internet on the RabotaVsem platform.

sections.title: 1. General Provisions
content: This User Agreement (hereinafter - the Agreement) governs the relationship between RabotaVsem company (hereinafter - the Administration) and users of the RabotaVsem platform (hereinafter - Users, User).
By using the RabotaVsem platform, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any terms, please do not use our service.

The Administration reserves the right to change this Agreement at any time. Changes take effect from the moment of their publication on the platform. Continued use of the platform after making changes means your agreement with the new terms.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
content: RabotaVsem is a platform for finding specialists and part-time work with official employment. The platform provides the opportunity to:
Specialists - create profiles, post information about their services, receive orders from clients and work officially;
Clients - find verified specialists, view their profiles, reviews and ratings, contact specialists to order services;
We provide a platform for communication between clients and specialists, ensuring transparency, security of interaction and compliance with labor legislation.

sections.title: 3. Registration and Account
content: To use the platform, the User must go through the registration procedure by providing reliable information about themselves.
The User is responsible for the safety of their credentials (login, password) and for all actions performed under their account.
The User undertakes to immediately notify the Administration of any unauthorized use of their account.
The Administration has the right to block or delete the User's account in case of violation of this Agreement or the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

sections.title: 4. User Obligations
content: Users agree to:
Provide reliable, up-to-date and complete information about themselves;
Comply with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan and ethical standards;
Not use the platform for illegal purposes, fraud or deception of other users;
Respect the rights of other users, do not post offensive, defamatory or illegal content;
Not transfer their account to third parties;
Not use automated systems to access the platform without written permission from the Administration;
Comply with the rules for posting content and not violate the copyrights of third parties.

sections.title: 5. Official Employment
content: All specialists on the RabotaVsem platform work officially, in compliance with the labor legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
The Administration ensures legal protection and transparent conditions for cooperation between clients and specialists.
When officially employed, specialists undergo a verification procedure and provide the necessary documents in accordance with the requirements of the legislation.
All labor relations are formalized by official contracts, which guarantees the protection of the rights and interests of both parties.

sections.title: 6. Intellectual Property
content: All materials of the RabotaVsem platform, including design, texts, graphics, logos, are the property of the Administration and are protected by intellectual property legislation.

The User retains rights to the content posted by them on the platform, but grants the Administration a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce and distribute such content within the framework of the platform's functioning.
It is prohibited to copy, reproduce, distribute platform materials without written permission from the Administration.

sections.title: 7. Liability of the Parties
content: The Administration is not responsible for the quality of services provided by specialists, as well as for the results of interaction between clients and specialists.
The Administration ensures verification of specialists and verification of data, but the final decision on cooperation is made by the client based on their own assessment.
The User is fully responsible for the accuracy of the information provided and for the consequences of its use.
The Administration is not responsible for damage caused as a result of using or inability to use the platform, including lost profits.
In case of disputes between clients and specialists, the Administration may act as a mediator, but is not responsible for resolving such disputes.

sections.title: 8. Use Restrictions
content: The Administration reserves the right to restrict or terminate the User's access to the platform in case of violation of this Agreement without prior notice.
The use of the platform by persons who have not reached the age established by the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan for concluding contracts is prohibited.
The Administration has the right to delete any content that violates this Agreement or legislation without prior notice.

sections.title: 9. Final Provisions
content: This Agreement is governed by the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

All disputes arising in connection with this Agreement shall be resolved through negotiations, and if no agreement is reached - in court in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid, the remaining provisions continue to apply in full.
The Administration reserves the right to change the functionality of the platform at any time, suspend or stop its operation without prior notice to Users.
The current version of the User Agreement is posted on the RabotaVsem platform and is available for review at any time.

sections.title: 1. What is KYC
content: KYC (Know Your Customer) is a procedure for identifying and verifying clients, aimed at preventing fraud and ensuring platform security.

sections.title: 2. Verification Procedure
content: For anketas, we conduct verification of:
Contact data verification (phone, email)
Identity document verification
Work authorization confirmation
Experience and skills assessment

sections.title: 3. Why This Is Needed
content: KYC procedure ensures:
Security for clients — all anketas are verified
Protection of anketas' rights — official employment
Transaction transparency — all conditions are clearly defined
Legal compliance

sections.title: 4. Confidentiality
content: All data collected as part of the KYC procedure is stored in accordance with the Privacy Policy and legal requirements.
We do not transfer personal data to third parties without your consent.

story.title: How It All Started
story.paragraph1: It all began with a simple question: why is it so hard to find honest work with transparent conditions? Why are people forced to work without contracts, without guarantees, risking their time and reputation?
story.paragraph2: We saw thousands of talented people — students, young parents, specialists looking for part-time work — who wanted to work legally but didn't know where to find such opportunities. And we decided to change that.
story.paragraph3: That's how RabotaVsem was born — a platform where everyone can find official employment with fair conditions, without gray schemes and hidden commissions.

item1.title: 100% Legality
item1.description: We don't compromise. Every specialist works officially — with a contract, transparent conditions, and rights protection. This isn't just a legal requirement, it's our philosophy.

item2.title: People First
item2.description: To us, you're not just a user or application number. You're a person with dreams, goals, and the right to decent work. We've created a platform that respects your time and labor.

item3.title: Honesty in Everything
item3.description: No hidden fees. No surprises. No promises we can't keep. Just fair conditions, clear rules, and open communication.

item4.title: Growing Together
item4.description: We don't just connect specialists with clients. We're building a community of professionals where everyone can develop, earn reputation, and build a career on their own terms.
